name: icnaw
description:
Everything is collapsing. Stability is falling. You will die.

A top down shooter game where you must survive by slaughtering enemies in an insane and unstable world. As the stability keeps getting lower, more wacky and uncharacteristic things happen.

EPILEPSY WARNING

WASD to move 

LMB to shoot

Enter to start 

R to restart

For Ludum dare 49

------------------------------------------------------------------------
